auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to see today's special menu.
auth.joinCommunity: Join the canteen community to see today's menu.
auth.otpSentMessage: We sent a 4-digit code to your email
auth.forgotPasswordSubtitle: Don't worry! It happens. Please enter the email address linked to your canteen account to receive a recovery OTP.
auth.resetLinkSent: If the email exists, a password reset OTP has been sent.
auth.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please sign up again.
auth.resetPasswordSubtitle: Enter the OTP sent to your email and create a new password
auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
